sections.description: Vorfolio is a modern and responsive style theme template for WordPress fullsite editing and fully compatible with Gutenverse plugin. Vorfolio created especially for websites like CV/Resume to promote yourself and showcase your portfolios. Perfect for UI/UX Designer, Product Designer, Freelancer, Agency, Startup Business, and any online portfolio websites for companies or individuals that need a modern landing page for their business. The templates include both core version and Gutenverse plugin version, also has core and Gutenverse block patterns ready so you can start mix and match your template parts as you desire. The templates is built ready so you don't need to build it from scratch. We want to make your experience using WordPress fullsite editor more convenient.
